title: AC Technician Interview
Application Type: I applied in-person. The process took 1 day. I interviewed at Aga Khan Development Network (Karāchi) in Jan 2022
Interview Descriptions: Good and professional relevant to the job. They continued to interview me even though I did not have the required experience and qualification. I felt herd and I was given a fair chance at the job.
Interview Questions:
Where did I learn to work on AC units?
(To which my answer was online.)

title: Human Resources Interview
Application Type: I interviewed at Aga Khan Development Network
Interview Descriptions: It was average and the panel seemed okay to converse with. It went smooth although I did feel it was a little biased. Regardless overall it was an average experience
Interview Questions: How would you implement your knowledge in human resourxes

title: Supervisor Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Aga Khan Development Network
Interview Descriptions:
Simple and Personal life questions
Last job discussions and experiences Personal Hobbies and Professional Career.The Process is very standarized with 1st interview face to face with half hour long there are the HR and Hiring department heads mostly who conduct these interviews.

title: Electrical Engineer Interview
Application Type: I applied in-person. I interviewed at Aga Khan Development Network
Interview Descriptions: The interview was really good and truly in a friendly environment and they listen to your answered properly and they try to judge your side of troubles and the need for the job.
Interview Questions:
Tell us about your self ?
Your experience and professional growth ?

title: Finance Coordinator Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 4 months. I interviewed at Aga Khan Development Network (Islamabad, Islamabad)
Interview Descriptions: Lengthy and slow. Job related questions . Overall took 4 months. Phone and panel interviews. Written test which was job related and field related. Test was easy and simple. Interview was structured and difficult with phone and panel interview

title: Clinic Coordinator Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 2 months. I interviewed at Aga Khan Development Network (Bahund Sindh) in Mar 2016
Interview Descriptions: I applied through email, after 2 months got a reply through email and phone call. I appeared for interview,. It went very normal and friendly. They asked couple of question regarding personality and then about CV and then about current challenges .
Interview Questions: Why do you want to switch your current employer. And what kind of value will you bring to the clinical department

title: GIS Operator Interview
Application Type: I applied through an employee referral. The process took 1 day. I interviewed at Aga Khan Development Network (Lahore) in Apr 2012
Interview Descriptions:
It was very good experience
they have ti check my confidence level.
and Check my portfolio.
Interview Questions: what the type of your work?

title: Public Health Promoter Interview
Application Type: I applied through other source. The process took 1 day. I interviewed at Aga Khan Development Network (Hyderābād, Sind) in Nov 2011
Interview Descriptions: Well i went for interview after 2 days i got call tht i m selected for job. After two days there was orientation and on next day I joined my job. My interview went good. infact project cordinator was really nice during having interview, nice converstaion. He asked me for presentation as well. They jst checked my confidence and also my knowledge with regard position. At Agha Khan Health services pakistan i was on contract basis. There was their project, Good thng when their project get extended then they jst prefer those who r already working. Bt if they have any vacancy then they have interview
Interview Questions: There was any question which would b difficult. infact interwiew was easy.

title: Accountant Interview
Application Type: I applied through an employee referral. The process took 1 day. I interviewed at Aga Khan Development Network (Rāwalpindi) in Jun 2011
Interview Descriptions:
interview is most difficult specially for jobs in my interview panel as about myself and other my job related questions. like how to handle your departement difficulties and other related issues.
about my advice its depend on your job applied.
Interview Questions: why will consider for this job?

title: MBBS Student Interview
Application Type: I interviewed at Aga Khan Development Network (Rāwalpindi) in Jun 2011
Interview Descriptions:
Once you've cleared the entrance exam, you are interviewed twice in a single day by two different people.
My interview was held in Pearl Continental Rawalpindi.
They ask you basic questions about your personality, hobbies, goals, extracurricular activities, sports, academic achievements.
A highly friendly environment is kept. They'll keep you extremely comfortable.
Interview Questions: What are your remarks about cheating in exams?
